title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 412 - Application Of Medical Appeals Unit Rules To The Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 412 - Application Of Medical Appeals Unit Rules To The Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law

State Regulations
§ 412.1 - Procedure before the county medical societies, and workers' compensation committees of county medical societies; appeals and reviews before the medical appeals unit

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 412

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13-a a, 13-d, 13- e; Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58; Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
